Indie Game Development

In this module, you will be creating one polished, potentially publishable game, targeted at the Android platform and using the Unity Engine. To help you manage your project effectively, we will be using elements of industry-standard practices including Agile and sprints. Your game must be of sufficient depth and scope, but the genre and gameplay are entirely up to you.

The Unity game engine can be downloaded for free from Unity Technologies and install it to your machine. You can find the software at: www.unity3d.com. Please use Unity version number 2021.3.9f1 or 2021.3.10f1

Learning Objectives:

+  Demonstrate a fundamental understanding of techniques required to design and develop games targeted at social networks and mobile devices.

+   Create and define functional programming constructs required to meet program flow and aims of an original game concept.

+   Problem solve scenarios given to you by both staff and issues you encounter during the making of your own assets.

+   Determine how game characteristics, mechanics and platform constraints support the design and development of games.

+   Apply advanced knowledge and understanding of games design and implementation to produce functional games.
